review_text: Stayed 2 nights, great place to stay. Rooms are amazing & clean with everything you need. Good restaurant, the grounds & pool are truly beautiful especially for an early morning swim & then breakfast by pool. There are many cute restaurants nearby for other choices of food. The staff are beautiful but sometimes  little unorganised however it's not a big deal. Just go with the flow & enjoy it. I will stay again.  üëç

What an amazing spot . I was not sure of the location being two hours north west of the airport . But this is Bali‚Äôs little secret spot !!! It was the most beautiful spot with wildlife and amazing views . The staff was amazing and the prices was perfect .  We were walking distance to the Balian beach with wonderful beaches and surfing . We had the pool almost to our self‚Äô! We experienced great restaurants both at the hotel and down by the beach . I would not stay anywhere else . Thank you for a wonderful vacation and 12 days of bliss !!

We had Honeymoon Villa10 and has excellent ocean view. Wide and clean room, staff are friendly and food is very good. Recommended to people who wants to have a relaxing days and loves nature. You will hear the sound of the waves 24/7 but not disturbing. Excellent wifi connection and they have netflex and more. Just you can‚Äôt swim at the beach infront. You must go to Balian beach or other beaches you preferred  which is recommended and is just 10 minutes walking from the hotel. We will come back again. We had a wonderful stay.

Had a wonderful 4 nights here. A truly authentic Balinese feel. The bungalow was spacious and well appointed with an incredible ocean view. Staff were friendly and kind. It is a serene private oasis. Not everyone will love the old school Bali  atmosphere, but the private bay and lush surroundings was a perfect escape for us. Recommended for anyone who wants to detox and feel the traditional Balinese atmosphere

It‚Äôs our second time staying in this resort, we loved the garden villa but this time we decided to try the honeymoon villa which is closer to the cove. Unfortunately the waves were so loud, we couldn‚Äôt sleep. There were frogs in our room. It‚Äôs the wrong season to come I guess as it was rainy with thunders.  The restaurant staff are always so friendly and nice.  I think next time we will stick to the garden villa, much quieter and peaceful.

loved the lush oasis sanctuary that is this whole property. My own private villa, with an outdoor shower and rooms that feel like they‚Äôre from biblical times, made from stone. Amazing!

The bed was so comfy, and the linen was amazing. They also provided soap, shampoo, and conditioner, which was a nice touch.

The pool is incredible, and the private beach and caves are equally stunning. The property is just up the hill from the main food spots and Balian Beach.

You can hear the ocean and birds chirping all day long. It's truly magical.

One thing that wasn‚Äôt a major issue but worth mentioning: I had some problems with my sliding door. When I first arrived, it wouldn‚Äôt lock, but they fixed it straight away. On the second day, the door came off the tracks and wouldn‚Äôt shut‚Äîa different issue‚Äîbut they fixed it again promptly. The staff were very friendly throughout.

They also helped me arrange a bike rental and a car to my next destination. I would definitely recommend this place.

Pro: great location, great view, great facility despite old
Cons: dirty, not very very dirty, but because it was less occupied, so that the room was not really clean, as we expected before. Restaurant menu was bad, or meaning to say Never chose break fast package. For your info, other hotel surrounding area got so much better break fast package. During our stay, there was construction at pool and restaurants, so we were unlucky. I hope this place is getting better. Thanks.   4/5 is okay for us ya. I am Agus and my wife is Daria. Thanks.

The villas were spacious so we can‚Äôt hear the neighbors, very quiet surroundings, far the roads. If you are looking for a quiet place to retreat, this is where to go. The food was okay, nothing specia but still good.

For honeymoon room too far from lobby and dark no lamp. Need light. Too many house lizard and sometime they pup in ur bed. Before AC not cold but after complain they fix it and now cold. Thanks for helpful from the staff

We were doing a road trip around Bali and booked this place without knowing anything about it.  First, it was a little difficult to find.
Second, there is a LONG walk from where we park the bike to the room. Luckily we caught a break in the rain or it would have been miserable.
The place is older and a little run down.  It became clear that many of the best photos were from an earlier time where all the facilities were still maintained.
The location itself is very interesting: basically two tall cliffs that jut out into the ocean with a narrow little beach between them.  So it feel very private and secluded.  You can walk up to the outermost point on each cliff and you get great vistas of the ocean and distance beach-line.  But all the facilities up there are basically abandoned.  One side looked like it was once a spa, the other side has covered picnic tables, but everything is broken and falling apart.
Other aspects of the grounds were cute and interesting.  Old statues, little walkways, pretty lighting, etc.

The room itself was fine, bed and pillows great.  There is a restaurant on premises and it is basically the only food option.  It was ok, but not super exciting.

Staying at Gajah Mina Resort made the kids happy, the staff and facilities there are very good. The view facing the beach made our family feel entertained by the beautiful scenery of the beach. Next, we will go back there again.

I had a wonderful stay at Gajah Mina Resort in Balian! The property itself is beautiful and peaceful, and my bungalow was clean and comfortable. 
However, I did notice that the staff seemed a bit understaffed, especially in the restaurant, which sometimes resulted in longer wait times. Despite this, I still enjoyed my stay and would recommend this resort to anyone visiting Balian.
We really enjoyed our quick stay at the hotel. It was very quiet and definitely off the beaten path. The staff were extremely helpful with getting us a driver when we needed.

Sebenarnya hotel ini bagus, mungkin manajemennya aja yang perlu lebih profesional sehingga perawatan lingkungannya bisa maksimal sehingga kesan cantiknya bisa maksimal. Tapi overall saya sekeluarga ok dengan suasananya. Memang jalan ke lokasinya agak sempit tapi aman dan bagus jalannya, cuma lobby ke kamar suite nya jauh banget jalannya, tapi kamarnya luas dan nyaman

Booked for two nights and stayed for 2 more. Loved the whole extended property. Each room is its own house with a separate inside bathroom and outside totally private shower. No bugs or critters and WiFi worked great in bungalow #7. And of course A/C.  They have a huge pool with lounge chairs and umbrellas. A restaurant below with inside and out side dining. Breakfast is included. The food was delicious. Fresh vegetables etc. The service was friendly but sparse. Depending if others are dining there (open to the public) prepare to wait close to an hour for your dinner to arrive. They need more wait and cook staff. But still-don‚Äôt forget to tip the waiter! He works hard.  There is a secret beach that you can climb down to but the waves were too strong for me to swim in. They have this great massage house on the cliff overlooking the ocean with great breezes. The masseuse is fantastic and for 200,000 rp you can get a hot stone hour and a half massage. Quiet and peaceful- never needed to leave the premises. Book with Agoda- half the price!
Nice location. first time we stayed amazing but second time there was no toothbrush and the water pressure in the shower was super low. Pool is really nice and no one there also semi private beach.

The resort is right next to a private secluded beach, so you have all the privacy you want. The sea view from sea view bungalow is very limited, but you can enjoy it at the restaurant. Food is great! But you should pre-order if you need to follow certain schedule as the service could be slow. 

The room is really big, with spacious toilet too. Love the outdoor shower, as it feels free. 

No mosquitos! We are surrounded by greeneries, but none of it. They take good care of this point. Other bugs will still be there, but minimal. Overall, a great stay and highly recommend

This resort has a lot of potential but there are areas that can be improved upon.  At the end of the day, you get what you pay for and this resort offers tons for the $.

Pros: 
Inexpensive, nice rooms, excellent/tasty food, friendly staff, and views of the ocean.  

Cons: 
The speed of service is poor. We ordered dinner and it took over an hour (no exaggeration) to receive our food, and my family were the only guests within the restaurant.     

Our room included breakfast (which was tasty), but the staff person taking our order was incompetent.  I can speak Indonesian, so there was no language barrier or confusion.  But he was not properly trained.  

Long story short, it took 65 minutes (not joking) for us to receive our breakfast and we were the only guests at breakfast. When I would inquire about our meal, the staff responded by saying "Sorry that it's taking a long time".  

Also, the shampoo and body wash within the shower were Not usable.  These containers sit outside in the heat of the sun, which causes the shampoo and body was to became like a thick gel (unusable).  


The property is big and has a lots of potential, but needs improvement with landscaping maintenance, and a better path to the private beach. The current beach trekking path is overgrown and difficult to reach.  Unfortunately, we could access the beach which was going to be the highlight of our stay.

The resort is located at the end of the road, and cars can enter and park directly in front of it. We stayed in a 2-bedroom villa, which is very spacious with a typical Javanese/Balinese home atmosphere.

The restaurant faces the sea, so while having breakfast, you can enjoy the view of the ocean. The fried noodles and toast are delicious.
Really enjoyed my time here. Stayed in 9A and B and felt like we had the place to ourselves. Restaurant makes yummy food
it has nice view of balian beach, the access was relatively easy to find, near the main road of Gilimanuk-Denpasar

Lovely private dwellings among the trees offering nice shade, private veranda, spacious and relaxing. Excellent large pool and first class restaurant on side with amazing views of secret bay. A short walk up the hill to yoga and Balian beach, cafes etc.
My favorite spot to spend the weekend away.
Loved the secret garden outdoor shower area but wouldn‚Äôt work for tall people! Bungalows quite rustic. Restaurant serves delicious food. Pool is lovely. The beaches are not swimable.
Old but well maintained!
Gajah Mina is worthwhile staying at if you have a reason to be in that part ofBali. The food at their restaurant is very good, every meal was really delicious.
Great place to stay if you are looking for quite and beach vibes
Great place, staff, restaurant, location and facilities, ticked all the 5 star boxes

Gajah Mina is probably one of the best option to stay at Balian beach. We really liked the place, pool and restaurant.  But during all 5 days the air-conditioning is our room could not be repaired and was really tough we sleep. Little kitchen in the roof is outdated and can't be used. This place generally has a great potential but should be renovated.

We booked the 2 bedroom cottage with ocean view, but when we arrived there were 2 separate one bedroom cottage next to each other.
I think it is ckearly misleadung and the hotel should notifiy AGODA that this is not a two bedroom cottage. I mainly booked this resort so that we can stay all togethet in one room as a family if five . If I knew that we have two separate rooms then i would hav3 bookwd something cheaper.
Amazing stay. Highly recommend! Views are so good, location, staff. We loved our stay. Thank you

Stayed for 2 nights during the off season promotional period in one of the garden view villas. Loved the atmosphere and tranquility. Villa was perfect for us couple. Only thing we struggled was mosquito infestation in the room. Other than that it was a perfect stay for us.
Perfect location. Great value. Simple accommodations. Amazing view. Restaurant wasn‚Äôt our fav but many options nearby. Casa Balian and spot across from it were the best. Will definitely return.
Beautiful setting. Friendly helpful staff. Great pool.

This resort have the best view, the villa is at the cliff. gor srraight to the ocean. The food is also delicious. They make their own bread dan papayas jam for breadfast and it was very delicious. Love the breakfast.

Another very happy stay at Gajah Mina!
If you are thinking of staying, don‚Äôt hesitate‚Ä¶just book!
Staff are wonderful and the best massage therapist in Bali (Dian) works here.
A quick walk to the surf and yoga.
If you are a surfer with a non surfing partner, your partner will be happy here.
Highly recommend!

Cracking place to stay, off the beaten track. Wish I'd book longer. Great hosts, fabulous food and cold beer!

Loved the outdoor shower & accommodation - thanks

perfectly located at secret beach in balian. huge garden with beautiful ocean views. perfect to escape the busy tourist spots in south bali to immerse into nature.  delicious breakfast and very friendly staff. thanks for having us, we will come back soon.

Beautiful grounds and villas. If you want ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è then this is not your place. Gorgeous pool. Great restaurant. Staff friendly and helpful. Short walk to surf, yoga and warungs.

Wonderful 4 day stay at this resort that helps you escape to paradise
Value for money...Best staff ever!
Quality breakfast. 
10/10
We will be back...soon I hope.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND

during the 12 days stay I have always been feeling like I should not cheer the staff, or ask for a water refill or anything that would be for free. it's a pity that such a beautiful place is spoiled by money
The location was beautiful quiet & fantastic value for money the staff were fantastic the breakfast was lovely highly recommend

This place maybe used to be nice, but now so poorely maintained, it‚Äôs creepy. 
My room was covered in dust and spiderweb, in the bathroom lime spots everywhere, mirrors and windows seemed not to be cleaned for years.
I have allergy on dust and in minutes, I was covered in red itchy rush.
There were nobody to help me with the room, except security guard. He shows me another room that was covered in mouse poop all over the floor. I had to sleep in because it was too late to move somewhere else. 
But I strongly DO NOT recommend to stay at this place, no matter how low they drop the price.

the nature it‚Äôs beautiful, the room you can fit 3 people, beach is near.
breakfast food variations are good.

We had a wonderful time at Gajah Mina it was very calm and relaxing the villa had the most incredible view on top of a cliff overlooking the ocean. Incredible sunrise and sunset views every day. The food at the restaurant was nice and the staff was very friendly and accommodating
This is a hidden gem with a secluded beach. Visited the hotel July 2022, it was just recovering from covid times. We had a fun times at the beach and will surely go back.

Nothing's perfect, but Gajah Mina comes very close. It has comfortable well-separated villas, a delightful curved swimming pool and central restaurant, but it's the large grounds and dramatic scenery, complete with private cove, that make this place extra special. Just the most beautiful resort I've ever seen.

So happy to be back at the splendid Gajah Mina! Such a unique and special place. Sitting on the veranda of our cottage listening to the waves crashing and birds chirping is one of the best ways to decompress. If you are looking for a place to completely unwind and find peace this is it. Surrounded by black sand beaches, nature and unlimited beauty, plus you never have to leave the grounds because the food here is delicious. Covid had been hard on Bali but Dominique and Yaning and staff have kept Gajah Mina going. We were so happy to be back and will be again next year!!
Place is exceptional secret beach stole my heart ‚ù§Ô∏è

we stayed for a long weekend and loved that beautiful secluded resort! stunning beach views, fantastic breakfast (and lunch&dinner!), enormous pool and a super comfortable bed. we will definitely come back to this hidden gem.

Lovely villas, clean spacious and private.
Great outside shower. Lovely staff and good food in restaurant.
Got a very good price last minute but normal price still acceptable.

Pool good and very quiet.
Grounds spacious and immediately next to one beach. Two more beaches around 15 minutes walk.
Free tuktuk available, but don't forget to tip driver!!
Although plenty of walking available, heat makes it difficult.
Few local restaurants available but walk to local beach good for snacks and drinks while surfing!

Pool was dirty white gunk floating up off bottom if you went in,, really bad, no one swam while we were there, And you need a pool up there, service o at pool also.. The food at the restaurant  is very good and well priced. Has been  a beautiful  place  ,but staff don't seem happy  and there don't seem to  be any managament

The views were amazing, the cleanliness was ok but not great, dirty marks in fridge, grotty round lounges at pool, bath not clean..charming as very peaceful, nothing but the sound of the ocean day and night. 5 min walk to surf break. Brekky poached eggs Tom anc bacon great, food ok. Loved it here for the peace and quiet
We stayed in the three-bedroom private pool villa. It suited us perfectly being a young family.

We enjoyed our stay, the hotel is located in a tranquil part of Bali. For those who look for a relaxing stay without traffic and hoards of tourists this is the place. Don't expect anything fancy but what you get is good. Literally on the beach and very close to beach restaurants and bars. Admitting it takes a bit of an effort (organised by the hotel) to get there but once you are there relax and enjoy. We are fam. with two small kids, they enjoyed it a lot, beach and pool what else do you need!

A good place to stay if you want to switch off and relax.  The food was delicious. It's miles from anywhere though so we would recommend hiring a car if you want to explore the area.   We have three small children and there was not much for them to do although the pool is nice and there are good beach walks.   My one criticism of the hotel was that there seemed to be a lack of management presence and some of the staff seemed unhappy/disinterested (very unusual for Bali where the service is usually excellent and always given with a smile).
We really enjoyed our stay at the Gajah Mina, its beautiful location and peaceful stay far from crowds.

Un s√©jour front de mer sur la falaise avec des vues et des couchers de soleil incroyables, un excellent p‚Äôtit dej et une piscine tr√®s grande et chaude pour seulement quelques chambres , un resto de belle facture et d‚Äôautres warungs aux budgets plus serr√©s √† 500 m√®tres environ au bord de la mer tout pour passer un s√©jour reposant et authentique

Petit joyaux hors de la civilisation... Un √©norme parcours p√©destre, une grande piscine, des vues imprenables, de la verdure, des pierres, un excellent logement, douche ext√©rieure... Bref, diff√©rent de tout ce que nous avons pu conna√Ætre. Belle exp√©rience.

Un emplacement id√©al si vous voulez vous ressourcer, √™tre au calme. 
De nombreuses prises ds la chambre, un plus qd on travaille sur ordi. 
 
L h√¥tel au moment o√π j y ai s√©journ√© est quasi d√©sert . 

L h√¥tel est comme son personnel...au ralenti üòâ...

J ai b√©n√©ficier d un massage aux Pierres chaudes,  absolument divin .
Excellent stay in that beautiful property. Beautiful site, nice rooms, good breakfast in front of the bay...I wish to go again

Nous avions d√©j√† s√©journ√© dans cet h√¥tel en 2005 , nous avons retrouv√© la m√™me ambiance , il manque peut-√™tre un peu d‚Äôentretien et de personnel ,restaurant excellent mais service tr√®s lent ,si vous souhaitez visiter les alentours il vous faut un scooter

Tr√®s bon rapport qualit√© prix.
Une petite proposition d'am√©lioration : Mettre des distributeurs de gels douches
H√¥tel perdu au bout d‚Äôun chemin dangereux. Beaucoup de homestays juste avant bien plus conviviaux.

Parfaitement.. le personnel est charmant et vous vous sentez √† Bali dans un envirronement authentique et non aseptis√©. les massages et les soins sont tres peu chers (9 euros l'heure!) et vous permettent d'en profiter pleinement. le spa est incroyable, situ√© tout au bout de la falaise. la cuisine est excellente. ravie egalement d'avoir rencontr√© Dominique et sa famille

super hotel bien situer endroit parfait pour relaxer, loin de tous les bruit urbain, staff chaleureur toujour pres a vous ecouter et a vous servire avec le sourire, vus incroyable de la falaise sur la mer, plage parcontre est belle mais pas de sable blanc ici sable poivrer et boucoup de vage parfais pour ceux qu y aime serffer nouriture tres bien, je recommende pour relaxer, pas pour fair la fete...

Hier hat sich jemand bei der Konzeption der Anlage wirklich Gedanken gemacht. Inmitten eines wundersch√∂nen exotischen Gartens ziehen sich die gut platzierten Bungalows bis hin zu einer Klippe. Wunderbare Aussichten, Zugang zu einem kleinen Privatstrand und einer der harmonischsten Pools, in denen ich bisher geschwommen bin.
Putu und Made haben sich sehr gut um uns gek√ºmmert. Terima kasih! Wir kommen ganz sicher bald wieder.

Sehr sch√∂ne und ruhige Anlage mit ca 12 Bungalows in einem sehr gro√üen Garten, 3 Bungalows (Honeymoonsuiten) mit direktem Blick auf das Meer. Das erste Hotel in Bali, in dem wir schneewei√üe Handt√ºcher und neue Bettw√§sche hatten.  Zudem sind die Zimmer sehr ger√§umig, mit Klimaanlage und Fan, bequemes Bett, gro√ües Bad mit sauberer Dusche, gro√üer Badewanne und viel Ablagefl√§che.  An dem gro√üen und gepflegtem Pool bekommt man immer freie Liegen. Das gesamte Hotel- und Restaurantpersonal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. 
Ein Highlight ist das Essen in dem kleinen Restaurant. Es wird alles frisch zubereitet, dauert zwar etwas l√§nger, aber das Warten lohnt sich, alles schmeckt ausgezeichnet zu normalen Preisen. Zudem werden leckeres Brot und Kuchen selbst gebacken, Ravioli, Fettuchine, Bacon, Pesto, leckere Papayamarmelade und Eis sind ebenfalls homemade. Alle Gerichte werden liebevoll und mit frischen Kr√§utern angerichtet. Zum Fr√ºhst√ºck gibt es eine Karte mit Auswahl verschiedener Gerichte, alles lecker und sehr reichlich. Auch unser erstes Hotel, in dem wir 6-7 verschiedene Fr√ºchte im Fruitsalad zum Fr√ºhst√ºck bekommen haben. Trinkwasser kann man sich im Restaurant in jeder Menge auff√ºllen.
Von der Restaurantterrasse hat man einen herrlichen Blick auf die Secret Bay. Von  10 Pkt. vergeben wir an  K√ºche und Restaurant 12 Punkte. 

√úber einen kleinen Naturweg l√§uft man ca 10 min zur Mejan Beach, wo man herrlich lange Strandwanderungen unternehmen kann. Im Ort gibt es Superm√§rkte und einen Nachtmarkt ( ca 20 min Fu√üweg).

Wir hatten 5 N√§chte gebucht, haben uns aber so wohl gef√ºhlt (trotz einiger Regentage), dass wir noch 3 N√§chte verl√§ngert haben und kommen in unserem n√§chsten Urlaub auf jeden Fall zur√ºck ins Gajah Mina Beach Resort. Vielen Dank allen Angestellten f√ºr unseren sch√∂nen und erholsamen Aufenthalt.
Birgit und Ronald
I was positively surprised. The bed was very comfortable and there were no insects in the room.

Es liegt mitten an einem Strand beim Essen kann der Blick aufs Meer schweifen und so teuer ist das Restaurant auch nicht, die Portionen sind n√§mlich sch√∂n gro√ü. Man wartet nur etwas l√§nger aufs Essen (balinesische Gem√ºtlichkeit), wer aber Angst vor Ameisen oder Sonstigem hat, sollte am besten ein anderes Hotel suchen, wir fanden es sch√∂n da man gef√ºhlt mit der Natur zusammen lebt.

wir haben den Aufenhalt sehr genossen und hatten eine tolle Zeit.
Das Hotel ist allerdings ein paar Minuten vom Strand entfernt, daf√ºr hat man totale Ruhe und kann diese geniessen.
Die Bungalows sind shr sch√∂n, richtig zum wohlf√ºhlen.

Sembra di essere soli in mezzo alle palme e  alla vegetazione....ma in realt√† le unit√† abitative sono sparse per la propriet√† in maniera ottimale.
Per chi vuole un'esperienza "isolati" dal mondo, ma in realt√† all'interno di una struttura sicura e che ti accoglie con la rinomata gentilezza Balinese.

Il resort si trova su un promontorio direttamente sull'oceano, quindi dal ristorante e da alcune camere la vista √® fantastica. La piscina √® molto bella e rilassante. La cucina buona. Le stanze sono un po' vecchie, non pulitissime, il letto comodo. Sono in mezzo alla natura, quindi sar√† probabile avere insetti e gechi in camera

Wij kwamen rond middernacht aan en hadden dus geen idee waar we terecht gekomen waren. Toen we ‚Äòs morgens de gordijnen openden waanden we ons in het paradijs. De priv√© bungalows liggen in een prachtige tuin die grenst aan een verborgen inham in de kustlijn. Het restaurant serveert heerlijk eten en het personeel is vriendelijk. Het resort is misschien een beetje verouderd maar wij vonden dit een fantastische start van onze vakantie op Bali. Niet onbelangrijk; de bedden liggen heerlijk.

Lokasi hotel masuk ke jalan sempit dan kurang petunjuk arah, staff ramah, hotel banyak nyamuk, semut merah dan serangga, pelayanan di resto terutama untuk dinner sangat lama padahal tidak ada pesanan tamu lain, area penerangan di dalam area hotel sangat terbatas, banyak lampu jalan di dalam hotel yang mati tapi terkesan dibiarkan, breakfast minimalis sekali

Lokasi hotel ini bukan di tepi jalan raya tapi harus masuk jalan desa yang sempit. Lampu di jalan setapak hotel banyak yang mati sehingga tamu butuh senter untuk jalan di malam hari. Banyak nyamuk, semut merah besar di area kamar sangat menggangu bagi kami yang membawa anak kecil
ÊÄß‰ª∑ÊØîÈ´òÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØÂú∞ÁÇπÊúâÁÇπÂÅèÔºåÁ¶ªÊú∫Âú∫Â•ΩËøúÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúË¶ÅËµ∂È£ûÊú∫ÁöÑËµ∑Á†ÅÈúÄË¶ÅÊèêÊó©3Â∞èÊó∂ÂºÄÂßãÂá∫ÂèëÂéªÊú∫Âú∫ÔºåÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÁöÑÈÉΩ‰∏çÈîôÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂç´ÁîüÂÜçÂ•Ω‰∏ÄÁÇπÂ∞±ÂÆåÁæé‰∫Üüòä
Lengkapi pasta gigi karena kalo mau beli cukup jauh
Untuk anda yg mencari ketenangan dan ingin me time bersama pasangan, ini pilihan yg cocok.

Recomended..
Kalau ke bali lagi, pasti saya ke gajah mina resort lg..

Seandainya terdapat pilihan tidak ada bintang saya kasi tidak ada bintang. Sangat tidak direkomendasikan.
1. Penerangan di semua area resort sangat minim, bahkan di sepanjang jalan menuju villa honeymoon-1 yang lokasinya di ujung paling dekat dengan pantai kondisi jalannya gelap tanpa penerangan sama sekali atau lampu-lampu dibiarkan mati.
2. Banyak semut masuk ke kamar, sampai naik ke tempat tidur.
3. Penanganan komplain sangat lamban.
4. Sulit untuk mendapatkan makanan dikarenakan lokasi resort sangat pelosok,
Sedangkan di resto ketersediaan jenis makanan sangat terbatas atau minim macamnya.
5. Sikat gigi dan pasta gigi tidak ada
Utk fasilitas di hotel hrs diperhatikan thx
Traumhafte lage nettes hilfbereites personal. Restaurant topp.
ÁàõÈÄè‰∫Ü

My villa was clean, cool and peaceful I absolutely loved staying here. The pool was lovely. The beach was empty most of the time which is exactly what I was looking for. Spot to watch sunset with a coconut. Really good value for money! Only downside was tricky location, I couldn't order a Grab or Gojek even from the main road. But otherwise I enjoyed it all!
Loved staying here. Fantastic quiet location with stunning views.  The food was delicious, just be prepared to wait. Possibly need more kitchen staff.

We booked the honeymoon bungalow at the last minute, we had fantastic uninterrupted views of the ocean. Very magical view and on top of a cliff. Pool facilities were great. Very large property with lots of space for familys.
